mapper.update: update cart set p_amount = p_amount + #{p_amount} where m_email=#{m_email} and p_code=#{p_code}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where m_email=#{m_email} and p_code=#{p_code}

select c.*,
p.p_cost as p_cost, p.p_option1 as p_option1, p.p_option2 as p_option2, p.p_name as p_name, p.p_image as p_image, p.p_amount as max_amount
from members m, product p, cart c
where c.m_email = m.m_email and m.m_email = #{email}
order by c_seq
